data.title: Lampasas climate: Weather Lampasas & temperature by month
data.text:
>>Weather by month // weather averages Lampasas

>>Climate graph // Weather by Month Lampasas

>>average temperature by month Lampasas

>>Weather Lampasas

In Lampasas, the climatic conditions are categorized as mild and moderate. The precipitation levels in Lampasas are noteworthy, as there is rainfall even during the most arid month. According to the Köppen-Geiger classification, the prevailing climate in this region is categorized as Cfa. The average annual temperature in Lampasas is 19.5 °C | 67.2 °F. Approximately 832 mm | 32.8 inch of rainfall occurs on a yearly basis.

The specified area is located in the northern hemisphere of our planet. The onset of summer commences towards the conclusion of June and culminates by September. The season is characterized by a sequence of months, namely: June, July, August, September. The most favored period for a visit is during the months of May, June, July, August, September.

Climate graph // Weather by Month Lampasas

During August, the amount of precipitation is at its lowest, with only 48 mm | 1.9 inch recorded. The month of May experiences the highest amount of precipitation, with an average value of 115 mm | 4.5 inch.

average temperature by month Lampasas

The month of maximum warmth in a year is August. The average temperature during this period reaches up to 29.4 °C | 84.9 °F, making it the hottest time of the year. The month of January is characterized by the lowest temperatures, which have an average reading of 9.2 °C | 48.5 °F.

Weather by month // weather averages Lampasas

<>

January February March April May June July August September October November December

Data: 1991 - 2021 Min. Temperature °C (°F), Max. Temperature °C (°F), Precipitation / Rainfall mm (in), Humidity, Rainy days. Data: 1999 - 2019: avg. Sun hours

The variation in precipitation between the months with the lowest and highest levels of rainfall is 67 mm | 3 inch, as observed. The fluctuation of temperatures over the course of a year is referred to as temperature variation.

It has been observed that May exhibits the highest relative humidity, with a percentage of 63.58. On the other hand, August experiences the lowest relative humidity at an approximate rate of 51.54. According to the data, May is observed as the month with maximum rainy days (10.63) while July has recorded minimum rainfall during its tenure (5.73).

Lampasas weather and climate for every month

Hours of sunshine in Lampasas

avg. hours of sun

Total hours of sun

Within the region of Lampasas, the month that experiences a maximum number of daily hours with bright sunshine is July exhibiting an average duration of approximately 10.99. In totality, there are about 340.79 hours worth of sunlight throughout this particular period.

On average, the location of Lampasas experiences the least number of daily hours with sunshine during January. The total duration of sunlight in this period is recorded as 199.84, while an average of about 6.66 hours are received per day.

Throughout the year, Lampasas experiences approximately 2991.76 hours of sunshine. The average monthly duration of sunlight is estimated to be around 98.25.

Airport close to Lampasas

The closest Airports of Lampasas are: Robert Gray Army Airfield (GRK) 34.36km,Robert Mueller Municipal Airport (AUS) 107.68km,Waco Regional Airport (ACT) 109.37km

You can reach Lampasas from this Cities by Plane: London (LHR), Baltimore (BWI), Detroit (DTW), Dallas (DAL), San Francisco (SFO), Houston (HOU), New Orleans (MSY), Seattle (SEA), Cancún (CUN), Las Vegas (LAS), Nashville (BNA), El Paso (ELP), New York (JFK), Mexico City (MEX), Orlando (MCO), Salt Lake City (SLC), Phoenix (PHX), Oakland (OAK), Lubbock (LBB), Denver (DEN)
